short_summary: Purchase, delivery, and installation of office seating for Canada Revenue Agency in Saint-John, New-Brunswick.
description: Office furniture and seating for the Canada Revenue Agency in Saint-John, New-Brunswick.
tags: Contractor must deliver to Canada Revenue Agency within 5 months.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### EB129-241427-RFP - Workplace Seating - Canada Revenue Agency - Saint John NB

**Reference Number:** WS4521750588-Doc4580284492
**Solicitation Number:** WS4521750588
**Publication Date:** May 14, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** May 29, 2024
**Expected Contract Start Date:** May 2, 2023 (Note: this date is listed incorrectly as 2024 in the original document)

**Procurement Details**

* Category: General Distribution (-Goods)
* Sub-Category: Office furniture and seating (UNSPSC Codes: 56101700 * Office furniture, 56112100 * Seating)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Tender Status: Expired

**Contracting Entity**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Person: Erin Surette (SPAC/PSPC), erin.surette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice Description**

The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA), on behalf of the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office seating to the CRA office in Saint John, New Brunswick. The required products fall under the PSPC's Supply Arrangement (SA) for office furniture, specifically rotary chairs and rotary stools.

**Eligibility and Instructions**

* Only suppliers who are pre-qualified and have been issued a supply arrangement are eligible to bid.
* Interested suppliers must submit their inquiries to the Contracting Authority.
* Suppliers wishing to become pre-qualified SA holders should contact [TPSGC.PARCNAmeublement-APNCRFurniture.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:TPSGC.PARCNAmeublement-APNCRFurniture.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) for more information.

**Procurement Strategy**

This procurement is set aside for the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business and is excluded from international trade agreements under the provisions for set-asides for small and minority businesses.

Please refer to the document link below for further details: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19698062?extsite=MTk2OTgwNjJfQU4wMTQ4
